107typedef struct DrawableTextures
108{
109 patch_t *large_numbers[10];
110 patch_t *small_numbers[10];
111 patch_t *large_percent_sign;
112 patch_t *large_minus_sign;
113 patch_t *status_bar;
114} DrawableTextures;
115
116DrawableTextures *drawable_get_textures();
117
122typedef union DrawableValue
123{
125 int *number;
127 char *text;
129 patch_t *texture;
130} DrawableValue;
131
135typedef enum DrawableType
136{
138 DRAWABLE_NUMBER,
140 DRAWABLE_TEXT,
142 DRAWABLE_TEXTURE
143} DrawableType;
144
145typedef struct Drawable
146{
147 DrawableValue value;
148 DrawableType type;
149
152 int x;
154 int y;
155
158 boolean use_large_font;
159
161 boolean *enabled;
162
164 int digits;
165
167 boolean show_percent_sign;
168} Drawable;
169
